collection:
This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your
information when you use our mobile application.

## Information Collection and Use

### Types of Data Collected

#### Personal Data

While using our application, we may ask you to provide us with certain
personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify
you ("Personal Data").

Personally identifiable information may include, but is
not limited to:

  * Email address

#### Usage Data

We may also collect information that your mobile device sends whenever you use
our app ("Usage Data").

This Usage Data may include information such as your
device's IP address, operating system, and other diagnostic data.

### Use of Data

We use the collected data solely for app-related purposes:

  * To provide and maintain our app
  * To notify you about changes to our app
  * To provide customer support
  * To monitor the usage of our app
  * To detect, prevent, and address technical issues

### Legal Basis for Processing Personal Data Under GDPR

If you are from the European Economic Area (EEA), our legal basis for
collecting and using your personal information depends on the specific context
in which we collect it.

* The right to access, update, or delete the information we have on you
  * The right to rectification
  * The right to object
  * The right to data portability
  * The right to withdraw consent

## Log Data

We want to inform you that whenever you use our app, we collect data and
information on your phone called Log Data in case of an error.

This Log Data
may include information such as your device IP address, device name, operating
system version, configuration of the app, the time and date of your app use,
and other statistics.

Our app does not use these “cookies” explicitly, but the
app may use third-party code and libraries that use cookies to collect
information and improve their services.

We do not knowingly
collect personally identifiable information from children under 13.
sharing:
## Data Transfer

Your information, including Personal Data, may be transferred to and
maintained on computers outside your state, province, country, or other
governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ from those
of your jurisdiction.
